answers.answer: I hear massaging with sunflower oil can help build their skin barrier or at least be a very good moisturizer for them
I hear massaging with sunflower oil can help build their skin barrier or at least be a very good moisturizer for them
Thanks for the tip!! My baby's skin started peeling.. I'll def check with doctor if its safe to use sunflower oil after she is out of NICU.

My husband and I bought an Angel Monitor with live feed in room. It has a pad you put under the mattress or bassinet pad and it monitors breathing. An alarm will go off after 10 seconds to let you know. We had our son at 31 weeks and that really put us at peace to let us sleep. Good luck in the NICU. take 1 day at a time
Thanks, asevern! Thats a great idea. I ll definitely look into getting one. Did you ever have it go off? What did you do in that case?
Luckily, ours only went off when we forgot to turn it off in the middle of the night feedings. Lol. That or when he started to roll onto his side and it couldn't detect the breathing although he was!
Ok, thats great!! Glad your little one is doing fine ))
Oh my 28 weeks that is early. How is she doing?Just out of curiosity, how much did she measure and weigh at birth?

She was small for her age. I got diagnosed with preeclampsia 2 days before I had her, so due to high blood pressure she didnt grow last 2 weeks.She was born 1lb 9oz (715 grams) and 13 inches. Now she is 31 weeks and weights 2lbs (920 grams).There are small problems that come up here and there but nothing that she cant overcome. Thank God!! She is eating breastmilk through the tube, breezing on her own but they still have her on additional oxygen. Moving legs, hands, and opening her eyes to look around. She is a strong girl and Im very proud of her progress!!

question: Hello ladies,I gave birth to a 28 week preemie on Sept 3rd. She'll be staying in NICU until around my due date, Nov 24th, and when her weight goes up to at least 4 lbs.I was wondering is there any special products needed for preemies for when they get home. Any must haves or good to have items??Thanks!!
title: Preemie mamas, any special baby products?
